trends: There have been 17 other sightings in Thousand Oaks
There were no other sightings in Thousand Oaks on or around April 22nd 1965
divs: sighting detailswitness reports that during his childhood, he and his brother encountered an unidentifiable object hovering in their backyard. it is believed by both the witness and his brother that the brother was abducted into the unknown craft while the witness ran for a camera. both believe they are missing time. the witness was also in the presence of an unknown entity while in the garage. [5-22-12\mcm]
Summary: Witness and brother missing time during close encounter. Historical./mcm
